name: MyPersonalPrayer
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my personal prayer
des:
Hear a brand new unique and personal prayer created especially for you.

My Personal Prayer provides a special prayer voiced on demand by Bishop Eric J. Freeman of the Meeting Place Church of Greater Columbia, SC. No matter how many times you request a prayer, you will receive a brand new and unique blessing every time.

Just say "Alexa, open My Personal Prayer" to get your personalized prayer.

To hear more prayers, just say "another prayer."
